original_title: Taylor Swift’s new album comes in cassette. Who is buying those? | CNN Business
article_summary: Taylor Swift's new album, "Life of a Showgirl," will be available on cassette tape, marking a resurgence of the format. Despite being nearly obsolete, cassette sales in the US increased significantly in 2023, with 436,400 units sold, according to Luminate. The comeback is driven by fans seeking a more intimate listening experience and a desire for tangible media, with Gen Z leading the trend.</s>
